messages.subject: Re: [SHQ_Spy_Division] Re: Love Triangle Music Vid
messages.msgSnippet: The tragedy of the missing images aside,  it was very very cool! LOVED how appropriately sad Takeda was. You _had_ to get the bears in there though huh?
messages.messageBody:
The tragedy of the missing images aside, it was very very cool! LOVED
how appropriately sad Takeda was.

You _had_ to get the bears in there though huh? *shakes head* It could
be worse he could like Hello Kitty...

--
Barbara Sheridan
http://www.barbarasheridan.net
The Blog-- http://barbarasheridan.blogspot.com/

messages.subject: Re: Love Triangle Music Vid

messages.messageBody:
interesting...you also get to hear the song 3 times too it seems


--- In SHQ_Spy_Division@yahoogroups.com, "secretary"
<secretarytocapt3@h...> wrote:
>
> now before you rush to download
> here are some things to consider
> it is 5 mb as a .wmv file
> and there seems to be something {{really}} wrong....
> I lost a minute of footage
> https://mywebspace.wisc.edu/tnamwong/web/lovetriangle.wmv
> so just enjoy the music...don't complain because sec is very mad...
>
>
> I made the vid at the school computer lab so I can't retrieve the
> original format and try to "restore" the missing images so the vid
> is only 2 min long...but the song is 3 min long
>
> thanx Barb for the images and theories on the love triangle in
NHK,
> or did we settle on love square, polygon oh heck circle because
> everyone is in on it....I even worked in Serizawa Kamo and
> Saitou...but alas it seems that my abuse of school resources has
> resulted in this technological tragedy
>
> **just a note to people out there...windows movie maker "unlinks"
> images/slides from the "timeline" used to make the vid (if some
kind
> of crash occurs). So all your images shows up as "x" and when you
> try to plug in the image to restore it all you end up screwing up
> the timing...just one HUGE headache....so keep "saving" your work
> otherwise windows movie maker is a very easy to learn program
>
> secretarytocapt3
> weeping bitterly....

messages.subject: Love Triangle Music Vid
messages.msgSnippet: now before you rush to download here are some things to consider it is 5 mb as a .wmv file and there seems to be something {{really}} wrong.... I lost a minute
messages.messageBody:
now before you rush to download
here are some things to consider
it is 5 mb as a .wmv file
and there seems to be something {{really}} wrong....
I lost a minute of footage
https://mywebspace.wisc.edu/tnamwong/web/lovetriangle.wmv
so just enjoy the music...don't complain because sec is very mad...


I made the vid at the school computer lab so I can't retrieve the
original format and try to "restore" the missing images so the vid
is only 2 min long...but the song is 3 min long

thanx Barb for the images and theories on the love triangle in NHK,
or did we settle on love square, polygon oh heck circle because
everyone is in on it....I even worked in Serizawa Kamo and
Saitou...but alas it seems that my abuse of school resources has
resulted in this technological tragedy

**just a note to people out there...windows movie maker "unlinks"
images/slides from the "timeline" used to make the vid (if some kind
of crash occurs). So all your images shows up as "x" and when you
try to plug in the image to restore it all you end up screwing up
the timing...just one HUGE headache....so keep "saving" your work
otherwise windows movie maker is a very easy to learn program

secretarytocapt3
weeping bitterly....
